author: rdonkin
msg: I've been against this change for sometime so I guess that's a little ironic that i end up committing it. This is useful for users and being able to replace MethodUtils with the improved version in lang is looking a long way off still.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for bug#15888. A lenient property was added to DateLocaleConverter that allows the lenient property to be set on the DateFormat used to parse the convertion. Also added a test case.

author: rdonkin
msg: The java 1.3 JVM (I run on) throws a ClassNotFoundException whenever primitive type classes (eg Double.TYPE) are deserialized. This means that DynaProperty serialization often fails. This is a workaround for this problem. The standard serialization mechanism is replaced by a custom implementation which serialization the primitive type classes using ints. I haven't tested it on later JVMs so I'd be grateful if people out there could find the time to update and run the tests on their platform just to ensure i haven't broken things for anyone else.
